reviews.text: Nice plaza not an awful lot of shops, they have a few more coming on line, like pull n bear  but there's enough to keep the better half occupied for a while, right next door to Savillie FC stadium so if a tour of the stadium is your thing then herself can.shop away while you do that ...if calsberg  did days out

A fair few decent shops at this Plaza and close to Sevilla's home football stadium, the Estadio Ramon Sanchez, which was impressive to see, as you can even see through to the pitch when it's closed. It is also close to other gardens too and therefore makes a nice walk / 1-2 hours out in Seville.

Great shopping mall to go and spend a couple of hours. There are even some restaurants and a cinema on the upper levels. Lots of fun! Okay variety of stores.
